# isFileURL

**Instance Property**

A boolean value that determines whether the receiver is a file URL.

## Declaration

```swift
var isFileURL: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The property’s value is  [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver uses the file scheme, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise. Both file path and file reference URLs are considered to be file URLs.

If this property’s value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], then the receiver’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL/path] property contains a suitable value for input into [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileManager] or `NSPathUtilities`.

## Querying an NSURL

- **checkResourceIsReachableAndReturnError(_:)**: Returns whether the resource pointed to by a file URL can be reached.
- **isFileReferenceURL()**: Returns whether the URL is a file reference URL.
